item.title: Teaching and Cooking
item.description:
Watching MasterChef Junior got me thinking about the similarities between cooking and teaching. It’s a phenomenal show, if you haven’t seen it.

  • mise en place
  • focus on technique
  • ability to improvise
  • quality resources
  • attention to detail
  • timing
